macd_crossover.name: MACD Crossover Strategy
macd_crossover.description: Trades based on MACD crossing signal line
customRules: Enter long when MACD crosses above signal line and RSI < 70
Enter short when MACD crosses below signal line and RSI > 30
Exit position when price moves 2% against entry

trend_following.name: Trend Following Strategy
trend_following.description: Follows market trends using moving averages
customRules: Enter long when short EMA crosses above long EMA
Enter short when short EMA crosses below long EMA
Set stop loss at 2 * ATR from entry

breakout_momentum.name: Breakout Momentum Strategy
customRules: Enter long on price break above upper band with volume > threshold
Enter short on price break below lower band with volume > threshold
Take profit at 2x the distance to entry band
